page.title: 09Fund Raising Activities
page.content: There are many different ways of raising money in our area. Here are some of them. Guess the weight of the cake is designed to raise funds for local charities. The idea is that you feel the weight of the cake, write your guess in a book, and the person who is nearest to the exact weight of the cake wins it. Another competition is name the teddy where you pay some money to guess the name which has been chosen by the maker; whoever guesses the right name wins the teddy bear. There are another 6 fund raising activities in our area including guess the birthday of the doll and sponsored walks, silence and slim. Guess the birthday of the doll is the same as the teddy. In the others you are sponsored for how many miles you walk, run, how long you are quiet or how many pounds you lose.
